TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PeerSecuritySettings extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the security settings associated with a peer channel, including the type of authentication used and the security used for the message transport.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new default instance of the class.
Gets and sets the value that indicates the security mode of the peer channel.
Docs.value: <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> enumeration value that indicates the security mode for the peer channel.
Docs.exception: The specified value is not an enumerated value from <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeMode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the security mode information should be serialized.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Boolean> that specifies if the security mode information should be serialized, and if it should not be serialized..

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeTransport() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the transport information should be serialized.
Docs.returns: Returns <xref:System.Boolean> that specifies if the transport information should be serialized, and if it should not be serialized..

Docs.summary: Gets the value that indicates the security settings for the transport used for messages transmitted over the peer channel.
Docs.value: that contains the transport security settings for the peer channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set only if <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerSecuritySettings.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.
